required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-Arm Trail Of Drug-Eluting Balloon Dilatation Catheter Treating Symptomatic Intracranial Atherosclerosis
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy And Safety Study For Endovascular Treatment Of Symptomatic Intracranial Atherosclerosis Using Drug-Eluting Balloon Dilatation Catheter: An Prospective Multicentre Single-arm Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhejiang Zylox Medical Device Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Zhejiang Zylox Medical Device Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a trial designed to test the efficacy and safety of the Drug-Eluting Balloon Dilatation Catheter.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective multicentre objective performance criteria(OPC) trail conducted by 11 centers in mainland China. Approximately 132 subjects with intracranial atherosclerosis receive endovascular treatment using the drug-eluting balloon dilatation catheter designed by Zylox.

primary_outcome.measure: Restenosis rate of the target vessel
primary_outcome.description: Subjects receive Digital Subtraction Angiography(DSA) / Computed Tomography Angiography(CTA) examination in 180 days to analyze whether the degree of stenosis is over 50%, if so, the target vessel restenosis happens.

secondary_outcome.measure: The average degree of stenosis within the target vessel
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects receive DSA / CTA examination in 180 days, the angiography results are handled by the investigators.
After receiving DSA examination, success rate of medical device is defined as in place-delivery, retracement of balloon after expanding, no fracture or crack, etc.
After receiving DSA examination, success rate of surgery is defined as modified thrombolysis in cerebral infarction score(mTICI) 2b/3 and stenosis<50%,whether assisted treatment is applied or not.

other_outcome.description: Medical device deficiency is defined as those risks which may effect the health or safety of subjects under common use, such as misleading label, damaged disinfection packaging, etc.
The rate of Hemorrhagic stroke as well as symptomatic ischemic stroke.
Subjects who died from any cause would be counted.
The definition of AE(Adverse Event) refers to ISO 14155
The definition of SAE (Serious Adverse Event) refers to ISO 14155

intervention.description: The catheter consists of a tip, a drug-coated balloon, a mark, a catheter and a catheter hub. The main component of the drug coating was sirolimus, and the coating was evenly distributed on the effective length surface of the balloon.

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of USTC
The First Affiliated Hospital of Wannan Medical College
Wuhan Hospital Of Traditional Chinese And Western Medicine
General Hospital of Northen Theater Command
The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
Beijing Chao-Yang hospital, Capital medical University
